content: What's the nearest star system to your location?

As an AI language model, I don't have a physical location, so I don't have a "nearest" star system. However, the closest star system to Earth is Alpha Centauri, which is approximately 4.37 light-years away. It's a triple star system consisting of Alpha Centauri A, Alpha Centauri B, and Proxima Centauri.
